mapper.select:
SELECT id AS id, field, identifier, seq, record_name AS recordName, record_value AS recordValue, record_tuple AS recordTuple, record_cluster AS recordCluster, record_timeline AS recordTimeline, timeline, create_time AS createTime, tmp_field_id AS tmpFieldId FROM st_statistics_record WHERE 1=1 AND st_statistics_record.field = #{field}
AND ( st_statistics_record.identifier = #{identifier} OR st_statistics_record.record_name = #{identifier})
AND CASE WHEN (record_timeline = '本月' OR timeline = 'M') THEN (month(create_time) = month(curdate()) and year(create_time) = year(curdate())) WHEN (record_timeline = '本周' OR timeline = 'W')THEN (week(create_time) = week(curdate()) and year(create_time) = year(curdate())) ELSE 1=1 END
ORDER BY seq,record_tuple
